localProof.headline: Where to Find Us in Oakland
localProof.directions: We are conveniently located at 432 Broadway, right across from Lake Merritt and just down the road from the Oakland Museum. If you are taking I-80 or I-880, take Exit 41 toward downtown Oakland. Our downtown location is easily accessible with nearby parking.

stateCompliance.headline: Understanding California Cash Advance Laws in Oakland
stateCompliance.content: Alameda County residents, including Oakland, benefit from California's strict consumer protection regulations.
keyPoints: Maximum loan amount is $300 including all fees
Maximum fee is 15% of check amount (460% APR typical)
Only one loan allowed at a time - rollovers prohibited
Lion Cash Advance is DFPI licensed and regulated
One $15 NSF fee maximum per bounced check
All disclosures in your preferred language
stateCompliance.regulatoryBody: California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI)
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is for educational purposes. California cash advance regulations may change. For current information, contact DFPI at 1-866-275-2677 or visit dfpi.ca.gov. Consult a California attorney for legal advice.

nearbyLocations.headline: Also Serving Nearby Bay Area Communities
nearbyLocations.intro: Can't make it to our Oakland location? We serve these nearby Bay Area cities:

faq.question: Where is your Oakland location?
faq.answer: We're at 432 Broadway, Suite 220, right across from Lake Merritt in downtown Oakland. Take I-80 or I-880 to Exit 41 toward downtown. Easy street and garage parking nearby.

faq.question: How fast can I get approved in Oakland?
faq.answer: Most applications take 30-45 minutes. Bring a valid ID, recent pay stubs or proof of income, and checking account details for same-day approval.

faq.question: What's the maximum loan amount?
faq.answer: California law limits loans to $300 including all fees. With the standard 15% fee, you can typically borrow up to $255.

faq.question: What are your fees?
faq.answer: California caps fees at 15% of the check amount. For a $200 loan, fees are $30. For $255, the maximum fee is $45.

faq.question: Is Lion Cash Advance properly licensed?
faq.answer: Yes, we are fully licensed by the California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation. Verify at dfpi.ca.gov/regulated-industries/regulated-entities-list/
